reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be of high quality with a lovely navy color and light fabric weight. Moreover, they appreciate its design, comfort, and fabric quality. However, the fit receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting that the sleeves are too long. Additionally, customers disagree on whether the dress is flattering. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress, Beautiful Fit!
items.body: This is one of my favorite dresses. I love everything about it!! I paid for it so I’m not just blowing smoke. The color is bright and vibrant. The fabric is light and flowy. I love that the sleeves are loose and go to my wrists and the dress goes to my ankles. I personally love that it’s modest and covers my chest. It has a beautiful silhouette and flows when you walk. I’m 5’6”, 120 lbs. and got a size small. It fits perfectly! I wish they had a bigger selection of colors. I want to buy 5 more. It’s versatile and I can wear it year round in all seasons. I feel incredibly beautiful and confident in it and received several compliments. If you’re on the fence, BUY IT!! I guarantee you’ll love it. If not, you can always return it. Read more
items.author: Chantell Violet Putnam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable and flattering
items.body: I was pleased with this dress for several reasons. With a full bust, finding a dress that is both flattering and comfortable can be a challenge. This one fit the bill in both categories! It looks very pretty and flattering on and the color (navy) is lovely. The material is not too heavy while still feeling high quality, the lining prevents transparency which means no slip is required and the way the fabric falls is very friendly for hiding any wrinkles from a long ride in the car to a wedding. Such a nice quality dress for the price! It was so comfortable—I felt it was the closest thing to loungewear while looking dressed up and elevated! It was a win! Read more
items.author: RM Mowrey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dresses
items.body: Bought this dress in the green and the blue and I love them both! I have received many compliments when wearing them to my office. I am 5'5", 125 pounds and the small fits perfectly! Good material, good quality! I will buy more! Read more
items.author: Paula

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute design, not for long-waisted gals
items.body: I tried this dress in two sizes because I loved the color and material, but the elastic in the waist did not hit my long waist in the right place despite the size. Other than that, I liked the light fabric weight, fabric quality, and the comfort of the dress. Read more
items.author: DrSciChick

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars The fit is off.
items.body: The fit is great in the waste but the top is too loose and the sleeves are way too long and loose. Read more
items.author: Amanda J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice fall dress…
items.body: I really liked the dress, the color and the design of it. It’s very pretty! I do wish I gotten a XL instead of the L just because it was a bit tight on my chest area. Read more
items.author: Jessi5P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: I am 5'5" weighing around 175lbs. The dress was super comfortable and I wore it to a wedding. Read more
items.author: Deb E

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are what they say they are.made very well for the money.
items.body: I was very pleased with them I have ordered 4 2 for gifts and 2 for me. Read more
items.author: RB

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Navy, Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
